moves.1. d4: Hi guys this is a game i played against gunnar01, a player with over 2000 rating and got my ass handed to me. Any tips where i could have don't better are appreciated. So i started with e4.
moves.1... Nf6 2. Nf3 d5 3. c4: This is the queens gambit, i usually try to play it, but i should study it a bit more.
moves.4. e3 Bf5 5. Bd3: shouldn't have done this. Gave my better bishop away.
moves.5... Bxd3 6. Qxd3 Nbd7 7. Nc3 e6 8. O-O: here i went wrong badly. i didn't notice the pressure on h2, and that mistake cost me the game in my opinion.
moves.14. cxd5 Qxh2+ 15. Kf1 Qh1+ 16. Ke2 Qxg2: queen had to move because it would've been trapped by rag1
moves.23... Be5 24. Bd2 Qh3 25. Re1: here i blunder completely and get in to a mating net.
moves.25... Bh2+ 26. Kh1 Bg3+ 27. Kg1 Qh2+: from here its mate next move. where did i go wrong and where i could have done better? hope you enjoyed this rather poor annotation.
